data.name: Fish Story: Gourmet Puzzle Demo
data.detailed_description:
New adventures of Lucian and his friend XO! This time, friends travel to mysterious planets in search of delicacies!
As part of this demo, you have to visit 5 planets! Collect groups of identical chips, destroy obstacles, use bonuses and collect points!
Great graphics and addictive gameplay await you. Help your friends on their journey and show your tactical skills!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 or 11
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 260 MB available space
